To identify the number of genetic clusters present in the overall data set, Bayesian assignment tests were used as implemented in the software STRUCTURE version 2.3.4 ( Pritchard et al. 2000 ). A hierarchical clustering approach ( Le Roux et al. 2010 ) was applied including native and non-native populations of all investigated Prosopis species, putative hybrids and Prosopis spp. individuals.
